Body:
popen = subprocess.Popen('xrandr | grep "*"', shell=True, stdout=subprocess
    .PIPE)
output = popen.communicate()[0]
output = output.decode().strip()
dimension = re.match('(\\d+x\\d+)', output).group(1)
width, height = tuple(map(int, dimension.split('x')))
assert get_screen_dimensions() == dict(width=width, height=height)
